org.apache.solr.client.solrj.io.stream.expr

Interface Expressible

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReduceOperation, StreamComparator, StreamEqualitor, StreamOperation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BiJoinStream, CloudSolrStream, ComplementStream, ConcatOperation, CountMetric, DaemonStream, DistinctOperation, FacetStream, FeaturesSelectionStream, FieldComparator, FieldEqualitor, GatherNodesStream, GroupOperation, HashJoinStream, InnerJoinStream, IntersectStream, JDBCStream, JoinStream, LeftOuterJoinStream, MaxMetric, MeanMetric, MergeStream, Metric, MinMetric, MultipleFieldComparator, MultipleFieldEqualitor, OuterHashJoinStream, ParallelStream, PushBackStream, RandomStream, RankStream, ReducerStream, ReplaceOperation, ReplaceWithFieldOperation, ReplaceWithValueOperation, RollupStream, ScoreNodesStream, SelectStream, ShortestPathStream, SortStream, StatsStream, SumMetric, TextLogitStream, TopicStream, UniqueStream, UpdateStream

    public interface Expressible
    Defines a stream that can be expressed in an expression

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Explanation toExplanation(StreamFactory factory)
      Returns an explanation about the stream object

      • toExplanation

        Explanation toExplanation(StreamFactory factory)
                   throws IOException
        Returns an explanation about the stream object
        Parameters:
        factory - Stream factory for this, contains information about the function name
        Returns:
        Explanation about this stream object containing explanations of any child stream objects
        Throws:
        IOException - throw on any error
